original_title: 秘密捜査官の女2 堕ちていく里切りのエージェント 麻美ゆま
overview: "I will never lose... women can be fearsome too" It's been a year and half since the incident... Secret Investigator "Yuma" became the mistress of the boss of the enemy's organization... Even more hardcore rape than the previous installment! In a world filled with lies, betrayal, and trickery, the beautiful Secret Investigator "Yuma" gets violated by evil men with an insatiable craving for flesh!
title: Secret Woman Investigator 2: Fallen Betraying Agent Yuma Asami
